schema.name: deployment_ddl
schema.description: tables for the daf deployment repository
schema.comment: These tables are for the daf deployment system

column.name: deployment_id
column.description: each deployment element has a unique id

column.name: version
column.description: the version of the deployment item

column.name: start_time
column.description: the time the deployment started

column.name: end_time
column.description: the time the deployment completed successfully

column.name: failure_time
column.description: the time the last failure occurred, if a failure occurred

column.name: status
column.description: the status of the deployment

column.name: prev_status
column.description: the status of the deployment prior to a cancel

column.name: status_detail
column.description: a detail message about the current status

column.name: current_phase
column.description: the current phase of the deployment

column.name: rep_high_mark
column.description: the high water mark for repository items

column.name: rep_marks_avail
column.description: the number of repository markers available for processing

column.name: file_high_mark
column.description: the high water mark for files

column.name: file_marks_avail
column.description: the number of file markers available for processing

column.name: thread_batch_size
column.description: the size of a batch for a thread to process

column.name: failure_count
column.description: the number of failures which occurred during processing

column.name: purge_deploy_data
column.description: flag indicating whether to purge the deployment data on completion

index.name: das_dpl_start_idx
index.description: makes searching on the start time of deployment elements faster

column.name: deployment_id
column.description: each deployment element has a unique id

column.name: version
column.description: the version of the deployment item

column.name: work_completed
column.description: the number of units of work completed for this deployment

column.name: total_work
column.description: the total units of work for this deployment

column.name: thread_batch_id
column.description: each thread batch element has a unique id

column.name: version
column.description: the version of the thread batch item

column.name: deployment
column.description: each thread batch element has a reference to its deployment

column.name: type
column.description: the type of thread batch, file or repository

column.name: owner
column.description: each thread batch element has an owner server/ip address

column.name: thread_name
column.description: each thread batch element is claimed by a specific thread

column.name: lower_bound
column.description: the lower bound for this batch

column.name: upper_bound
column.description: the upper bound for this batch

column.name: last_update_time
column.description: the last time this item was updated

column.name: running
column.description: whether this batch is running

index.name: das_tb_deployment
index.description: makes searching on the deployment id of thread batch elements faster

index.name: das_tb_owner
index.description: makes searching on the owner of thread batch elements faster

index.name: das_tb_thread_nam
index.description: makes searching on the thread name of thread batch elements faster

table.name: das_deploy_data
table.description: information associated with deployment data elements

column.name: deploy_data_id
column.description: the id of this deployment data item

column.name: version
column.description: the version of the deployment data item

column.name: type
column.description: the type of deployment data

column.name: source
column.description: the source component of the data

column.name: destination
column.description: the destination component for the data

column.name: dest_server
column.description: the IP and port of the destination server

column.name: deployment
column.description: the deployment this deployment data is associated with

foreign-key.name: dd_deployment_fk
foreign-key.description: ensures that the deployment value exists in the das_deployment table

column.name: marker_id
column.description: the id of this marker item

column.name: version
column.description: the version of the marker item

column.name: type
column.description: the type of marker

column.name: status
column.description: the status of the marker

column.name: index_number
column.description: the index of the marker

column.name: marker_action
column.description: the action to execute on the marker

column.name: f_src_devline_id
column.description: the source development line id for forward deployment this marker is concerned with

column.name: r_src_devline_id
column.description: the source development line id for rollback deployment this marker is concerned with

column.name: deployment_id
column.description: the deployment id this marker is associated with

column.name: deployment_data
column.description: the deployment data this marker is associated with

index.name: marker_index_idx
index.description: makes searching on the index_number of markers faster

index.name: marker_data_idx
index.description: makes deletes on the deployment_data faster and prevents deadlock

table.name: das_rep_mark
table.description: information associated with repository marker elements

column.name: rep_marker_id
column.description: the id of this repository marker item

column.name: item_desc_name
column.description: the item descriptor name of the repository marker

column.name: item_id
column.description: the item id of the repository marker

table.name: das_file_mark
table.description: information associated with file marker elements

column.name: file_marker_id
column.description: the id of this file marker item

column.name: file_path
column.description: the file path of the file marker

table.name: das_depl_depldat
table.description: deployment data items associated with a deployment

column.name: deployment_id
column.description: the id of the deployment

column.name: sequence_num
column.description: the sequence number which determines the ordering of the deployment data elements

column.name: deployment_data
column.description: the deployment data id

table.name: das_depl_options
table.description: deployment options associated with a deployment

column.name: deployment_id
column.description: the id of the deployment

column.name: tag
column.description: the name of the deployment option

column.name: optionValue
column.description: the value of the option

table.name: das_depl_repmaps
table.description: repository mappings associated with a deployment

column.name: deployment_id
column.description: the id of the deployment

column.name: source
column.description: the source repositories

column.name: destination
column.description: the destination repositories

table.name: das_depl_item_ref
table.description: repository item references created for deployments

column.name: item_ref_id
column.description: the id of the item reference

column.name: version
column.description: the version of the marker item

column.name: deployment_id
column.description: the deployment id the reference is associated with

column.name: repository
column.description: the repository the reference is in

column.name: item_desc_name
column.description: the item descriptor name of the reference

column.name: item_id
column.description: the item id of the reference

column.name: item_index
column.description: the item index of the reference

index.name: das_dpl_itmx_idx
index.description: makes searching on the item_index columns faster

index.name: das_dpl_dplid_idx
index.description: makes searching on the deployment_id columns faster

table.name: das_dd_markers
table.description: marker items associated with a deployment data

column.name: deploy_data_id
column.description: the id of the deployment data

column.name: sequence_num
column.description: the sequence number which determines the ordering of the marker elements

column.name: marker
column.description: the marker id

foreign-key.name: marker_fk
foreign-key.description: ensures that the marker_id exists in the das_deploy_mark table

column.name: id
column.description: primary key of failureinfo

column.name: deployment_id
column.description: The deploying in which this error occurred

column.name: marker_id
column.description: id of the marker for which this is failure detail

index.name: das_dep_fl_dp_idx
index.description: makes searching on the deployment_id faster
